import { Code, Card, LinkButton, Tabs, TabItem } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';
import { specs } from '@sjsf/flowbite3-theme/specs';
import styles from '@sjsf/flowbite3-theme/styles.css?inline';

import { THEME_PACKAGES } from '@/shared';
import Npm from '@/components/npm.astro';
import Picker from '@/components/picker.astro';
import FormCard from '@/components/form-card.astro';

import Form from './_flowbite3-theme.svelte';
import { createSchemas } from "./_demo-schema";

export const schemas = createSchemas(specs)

<Picker>
  <a href="../flowbite/" data-active={false}>v2</a>
  <a href="." data-active={true}>v3</a>
</Picker>

## Installation

<Npm pkg={THEME_PACKAGES.flowbite3} />

:::note

This is `flowbite-svelte@next` based theme (Tailwind v4).

:::

### Install Flowbite Svelte v3

<LinkButton href="https://next.flowbite-svelte.com/docs/pages/quickstart" variant='secondary' target="_blank" icon="external" >
  Quickstart - Flowbite Svelte
</LinkButton>

### Configuration

Register the theme source path by adding a line like this to the `app.css` file.

`@source "../node_modules/@sjsf/flowbite3-theme/dist";`

## Widgets

<Tabs>
  <TabItem label='Form'>
    <FormCard style={styles}>
      <Form client:only="svelte" />
    </FormCard>
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem label="JSON Schema" >
    <Code lang="json" code={JSON.stringify(schemas.schema, null, 2)} />
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem label="UI Schema">
    <Code lang="json" code={JSON.stringify(schemas.uiSchema, null, 2)} />
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
